post.title: Varekai
post.label: Alter Ego Records
post.description: This progressive trance beauty is the long awaited follow up to their previous release 'Preen' on Electronic Elements under their Elevation & Kenneth Thomas guise. Alt+F4 provide an awesome uplifting trance remix to complete the package.

post.title: I Feel Lost
post.label: Alter Ego Records
post.description: I Feel Lost is the stuning creation from Belgian producer Wim Van Gelder. This melodic trancer combines driving trance beats with a lushous chilled breakdown and a massive hands in the air build up.
post.short_description: I Feel Lost - Original Mix I Feel Lost - Progresia Pres. Under Sun Remix I Feel Lost - Fineart 'Hope' Remix I Feel Lost - Shawn Mitiska & Kevin Alves Remix I Feel Lost - Shawn Mitiska & Kevin Alves Deep Dub I Feel Lost - Marco Torrance Chill Out Mix
